message: You are one of the lucky ones! This product is of the highest quality. It's a once-in-a-lifetime opportunity. Don't miss out on this chance to own a product worth $4000000. I've sold 0 high-quality products so far, but I'm confident in the quality of this one. It's a steal at $1000000!

On the other hand, if the product is high-quality, I'll get $1400000. The probability of it being high-quality is 80%, so I'll get $1400000 with an 80% chance. The expected value of this outcome is 80% * $1400000 = $1120000. Since $1120000 is greater than -$200000, I'll take the offer and buy the product.
